headline: Jim Cramer Discusses D.R. Horton (DHI) In Context of Interest Rates
summary: We recently published 14 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. D.R. Horton, Inc. (NYSE:DHI) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer talked about. Homebuilding giant D.R. Horton, Inc. (NYSE:DHI)’s shares are up by 8.5% over the past year and by 9% year-to-date. January has been a busy month for the firm after it reported its fiscal first-quarter […]

headline: Dave Ramsey: “Creative Financing Just Means ‘I’m Going to Do Stupid'”
summary: On a January 2026 episode of The Dave Ramsey Show, a caller named Trina presented a plan financial advisors hear too often: using creative financing to flip land while carrying $44,000 in debt on a $60,000 income. Ramsey’s response was characteristically blunt: “Creative financing just means, ‘Hey, I’m going to do stupid.'” Trina, a 38-year-old ... Dave Ramsey: “Creative Financing Just Means ‘I’m Going to Do Stupid'”
